job_tasks.phrase: ambition is to make Rabo Business Banking the most trusted and complete financial one-stop-shop for enterprising Netherlands.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the overarching business goal of the Rabo Business Banking area, indicating the need to understand and align with strategic objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: provide personalized insights into the financial administration and let entrepreneurs arrange everything with confidence in a smooth and simple manner.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the business value proposition and user experience goals that the technical work needs to support.

job_tasks.phrase: focuses on "Insights features" which provide RBB clients with categorised transactions and actionable insights on income and spendings to run their business, administration and finances better.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the specific business function and user benefit of the 'Insights features' team, requiring an understanding of client needs.

job_tasks.phrase: take responsibility for the entire software lifecycle - from idea to realization and operation.
job_tasks.justification: This broadly covers the software development lifecycle, including building and deploying applications.

job_tasks.phrase: develops the Rabobank app, the Global Sites & Rabo Business Banking, all from one single platform.
job_tasks.justification: This points to the development of user-facing applications and platforms.

job_tasks.phrase: fully fledged DevOps teams. This means that we are responsible for changing and deploying our applications.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions DevOps responsibility for deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: But that also means that we are responsible for keeping them up and running and stable.
job_tasks.justification: Indicates responsibility for maintaining and ensuring the stability of applications in production.

job_tasks.phrase: You will be asked to have a standby shift on weekdays and over the weekend, this task is rotated between all team members on weekly basis.
job_tasks.justification: This is a clear indicator of operational responsibility, including on-call duties to ensure application uptime.

soft_skills.phrase: going beyond just coding and creating new functionalities
ensuring the overall quality of the products and services your team delivers
take responsibility for the entire software lifecycle - from idea to realization and operation.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on the end-to-end software lifecycle, DevOps responsibilities, and business understanding. While it mentions 'insights features,' there's no indication of generative AI, LLMs, or core ML modeling tasks, which are central to the GenAI Engineer and ML Engineer profiles. The emphasis is on traditional software development and operations.
